snippet: WPIX, the New York City affiliate of the CW network, is off the air in homes serviced by Cablevision as the two sides reached an impasse in talks over retransmission fees.
abstract: WPIX, the New York City affiliate of the CW network, is off the air in homes serviced by Cablevision as the two sides reached an impasse in talks over retransmission fees.

headline.main: Fees Dispute Prompts Blackout of WPIX by Cablevision
headline.print_headline: Media: WPIX Blacked Out In Some Homes In Fee Dispute
